name: NationalCalendar
0:
”Alexa, launch National Calendar.”
”Alexa, ask National Calendar about today.”
”Alexa, ask National Calendar what is on the calendar for October 31?”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: national calendar
des:
The National Calendar skill was designed to give you fast access to new, fun events/days that can be celebrated in the United States, such as food holidays, pet/family holidays, and normal holidays. Some specific examples are listed below, but there are hundreds in the skill and more to be added!
 National Taco Day
 National Magic Day
 Halloween
 Canine Lymphoma Awareness Day
 National Religious Freedom Day
 National Spouses Day
 National K9 Veterans Day
 National Take a Walk in the Park Day

When making this skill I included as many days to celebrate as I could find but will continue to add more.

Here are some example of what you can ask Alexa:
"ask National Calendar about today"
"ask National Calendar about tomorrow"
"ask National Calendar what's in 30 days from today"
"ask National Calendar for 55 days ago"
"ask National Calendar what is on the calendar for October 31"

Every day of the year has something so be sure to check them out!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
